PATIENT_ID: TEST_NEUROSURG_001
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-18 02:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-18 02:10:00
Category I activation for 44-year-old male. Assault victim.
Traumatic brain injury suspected. TBI evaluation initiated.
GCS: 7. GCS documented. Intubated for airway protection.
BP 150/92, HR 62, RR 14 vent, GCS 7.
Neurologic examination: left pupil fixed and dilated.
Focal neurologic deficit: right hemiparesis.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-18 02:30:00
CT head: large acute right subdural hematoma with 12 mm midline shift.
Intracranial pathology confirmed. Subdural hemorrhage.
Brain CT demonstrates intracranial traumatic pathology.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-18 02:40:00
Severe TBI. GCS: 7 with intracranial mass lesion.
Neurosurgery consulted emergently.
Neurosurgical evaluation obtained within 30 minutes.
Patient taken to OR for emergent craniotomy.
